author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR starts from the observations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41901:
   * re-work `AlignmentStats` to avoid having to cache the `TrackerGeometry` to be used in the `endJob` (which prevents deleting the copy constructor of `TrackerGeometry`);
   * move header of `AlignmentStats` into a single file implementation;
   * fix `edm::EDGetTokenT` in `TkAlCaOverlapTagger` that was preventing to run the unit tests;
   * add test configuration for `AlignmentStats` and introduced a corresponding unit test.

#### PR validation:

   * `cmssw` compiles
   * `scram b runtests_testAlignmentStats` runs fine.
